verses.text: Ix tak'vixi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Ayxo scajvi in te ab'an juntzanh lolonel tzeyalub'tanhej tik. Tzeyak'och e b'a eyak'an snivanil in k'ool, palta anhej yaelal tze wach' iq'uejcot t'a vib'anh.
¿Tom malaj slajvub' juntzanh e lolonel malaj yelk'och tik? ¿Tas eyaji yuj chi' anhej val ha' e pacan t'ayin?
Q'uinaloc a ex tik icha val vaj tik eyaji, max am val-laj icha tzeyutej eyalan tik t'ayin, max am in tzicub'tanhej in sat valan jantac lolonel t'ayex.
Palta jun, a am lolonel wach' syak' snivanil e k'ool, syak' e tek'anil, a am swal t'ayex.
Manh yujoc to tzin loloni, tz'och vaan in yaelal tik, manh yujoc pax to tzin em numan tz'ochpax vaan.
Ha Dios tz'ak'an lajvoquel vip. Ha pax tz'ik'anel eb' vamigo t'ayin.
Ichato preso vaj yuj. Jantac tas syik'chaanh eb' anima t'a in patic, jantac es lolonel syik'cot eb' t'a vib'anh.
Ha Dios tzak'anoch vuuj yic tzin sataneli, icha junok nok' chium nok'. Ay val och sat t'ayin, icha val to vajk'ool yaji.
Jantac eb' anima smolb'ej sb'a yic tzin sb'uchan eb'. Stz'itanb'at in sat eb', emnaquil tzin yutejcan eb'.
Ha Dios ix in ak'anoch t'a yol sk'ab' juntzanh anima te chuk spensar.
Junk'olal vajeq'ui, ix in svecchitani. Ix och yub'naj t'a in jaj, chok' ix in yutej, ix in yak'anoch t'a sat sjul-lab'.
Yalnhej b'aj sjavi sjul-lab' chi' t'ayin, ichato sk'axpaj t'a in nivanil tik, manhxa jab'oc snivank'olal t'ayin. Toxonhej spuccanb'at yol in k'ol t'a sat lu'um.
Jantac in aj in lajvi yuj. Scot val t'ayin icha junok soldado te tek'an.
Te cusk'olal vaji, ayoch pichul ya sva vuuj, manhxa jab'oc vopisio.
Ste mal in sat voq'ui, sq'uik'b'i q'uinal svila'.
Icha chi' vaji, wach'chom malaj mach b'aj ix och in mul, wach'nhej in lesal.
Mocab' k'ub'chajel jantac chukal ix ak'jioch t'a vib'anh. Ab'chajocab'i ayic tzin tevi yic tzin k'anan tojolal.
Ay jun ayoch in testigooc ayek' t'a satcha’anh, ha' ol och ved'oc.
Ha eb' vamigo tonhej tzin sb'uch eb', a inxo tik tzin ok'nhej t'a yichanh Dios.
Ayoc val junok mach tz'alan d'ha Dios vuuj, icha syutej junok mach scolan junok yetanimail.
Jayexonhej ab'il ayin eq'ui, haxo in b'at t'a chamel chi' b'aj maxtzac yal co paxta.
